MvcFileUploader
====================

Go to http://yousite/MvcUploaderTest/Demo

To see demo usages for the uploader in different modes uploading multiple files

version 1.3.5
====================
* MaxNumberOfFiles, DisableImagePreview by helper api, demo serverside error generate

version 1.3.4
====================
* Bug fix

version 1.3.3
====================
* Patches for IE8. Updated to use blueimp Fileupload release 9.0.1, bootstrap 3.0.1

version 1.3.2
====================
* bug fix. streamlined code.

version 1.3.0
====================
* Html helper simple builder api. Multiple inline uploader in same page.

version 1.2.0
====================
* customise whether FileSaver.StoreFile should throw exceptions to be handled by user code
* customise filename to be saved 
* demo for twitter bootstrap and JQuery UI
